entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
